name: Deathly Orbs
description:
You're alone, with nothing but your underwear.

Explore, mine and build whatever you dream of, but be ready for the night, when your dream becomes a nightmare.

Deathly Orbs features a rich combat system with directional attacks, combo points and abilities. Use those to fend off the orbs and defend the home you built yourself!

Almost everything in the procedurally-generated world of Deathly Orbs can be harvested and placed anywhere, allowing you to shape the world however you like.
